index_about_text: UCN is a European Union funded research project on user centric networking. The aim is to study and understand better user online activity and experience by collecting detailed data on application use, context and network communications.
index_resetreq_success: Password reset request sent! Check your mailbox.
index_reset_success: Password changed! You can now login with the new password. Don't forget to re-configure your VPN clients.
index_activation_success: Your account is now active! Please login and follow the instructions to install required sofware.
register_success: Registration succesfull! Check your email for further instructions.
error_missing_accept: You must allow data collection in order to register to the experiment!
error_user_exists: User '%s' exists already! Pick another username or email. If you have already registered and forgot your password, use the password reset button on the HOME page.
error_email: Failed to send email to: '%s'. Verify your email address or try again. Contact the admin if the error persists.
error_not_active: Account has not been activated - check your mailbox for activation link
error_resetpassword: Failed to reset password - verify the url.
error_not_authorized: You must login first to see the requested page.
